items.sentence: One of us will have to drive over and see Tom tomorrow.
Tom smiled when he realized Mary was about to kiss him.
Tom speaks French as well as anybody else in this room.
Tom hugged Mary tightly and never wanted to let her go.
Tom is better at science than anyone else in his class.
Tom won\'t be here tomorrow. I guarantee you that much.
Tom doesn\'t want to buy anything for Mary\'s birthday.
Tom lives within walking distance of the train station.
Tom locked himself in his room and refused to come out.
Tom might go to the zoo with Mary this coming Saturday.
